attributes.action: make N.H.S Dental Provision available for all pensioners
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: private dental services are too expensive to afford when on a pension.i was happy to pay for private services whilst working but find it impossible on a pension.no n.h.s dentists are available in my area.

rejection.details: The title of your petition implies that NHS Dental provision is not available to all pensioners, which is incorrect. Please rephrase your petition.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
